Package main.api

Interface ImmutableTable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MarkdownTable

    public interface ImmutableTable
    Interface ImmutableTable This Interface describes a read-only Table-Instance. Implementing classes of this Interface shall only have methods for reading the content of this table.
    Since:
    19.12.2017
    See Also:
    TableBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getCell​(int row, int column)
      Returns the content of the specified cell.
      java.lang.String[] getColumn​(int index)
      Returns the content of the requested column.
      java.lang.String[] getHeader​()
      Returns the content of the header row
      java.lang.String[] getRow​(int index)
      Returns the content of the requested row
      java.lang.String toString​()  
      void writeToFile​(java.lang.String path)
      Writes this table to a file.

    • Method Detail

        Returns the content of the header row
        Returns:

      • getRow

        java.lang.String[] getRow​(int index)
        Returns the content of the requested row
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the row in this table
        Returns:
        the row content
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if there is no row with the supplied index

      • getColumn

        java.lang.String[] getColumn​(int index)
        Returns the content of the requested column.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the column in this table
        Returns:
        the column content
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if there is no column with the supplied index

      • getCell

        java.lang.String getCell​(int row,
                         int column)
        Returns the content of the specified cell.
        Parameters:
        row - the row index
        column - the column index
        Returns:
        the content of the cell
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if at least one of the indices is out of bounds

      • writeToFile

        void writeToFile​(java.lang.String path)
        Writes this table to a file. If the file does not exist it will be created, if it exists, its content will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        path - The path and name of the file

        java.lang.String toString​()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
